item.description:
Last Call to help! Over 1000 people attended the past 2 weeks and raised over $20,000.00 in 6 hours. Arrive early as there will be long lines at 6pm. We will be there before 6pm

Join us for a fantastic way to help the Boston Marathon Bombing victims.

This Tuesday the Beer Hall at Harpoon Brewery will be open an extra hour from 6-9, to help raise funds for the  Boston One Fund.  All workers are volunteering their time and all proceeds from the sale of pretzels and beer will go to Boston One Fund.  Stop by the Harpoon Beer Hall, have a great beer (or two) and some pretzels and help the victims of the Boston Marathon Bombings.  No need to RSVP, just show up and help.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be at the Beer Hall before 6pm seated at a table
item.name: Boston One Fund Benefit at Harpoon Brewery (Last call)
